chat_history.message: Hello, My product iPhone 13 has the above problem: Good day, I would like a new invoice in English with a settled VAT of 19% and not as on the current invoice with 20%. Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile

The customer asks for the invoice to be issued in English.

Thank you

Regards,
Gurcan from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

Attached is the updated invoice. Thank you. 

Regards,
YL

Dear ecomobile

This invoice is issued in German.

Please issue an invoice in English.

Thank you

Regards,
Gurcan from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare, 

Apologies for the inconvenience caused. We have made the required ammendments on the invoice. Thank you. 

Regards, 
YL
